target_name: Promote the development, transfer, dissemination and diffusion of environmentally sound technologies to developing countries on favourable terms, including on concessional and preferential terms, as mutually agreed
computation_definitions:
Data unavailable (Type4)
There are currently no national statistics (Type 1), international statistics (Type 2), or alternative national statistics (Type 3) available. The Data of Type 1, type 2, or type 3 can be also included in case of temporary unavailability.
computation_calculations: 매년 각국 정부에 설문지를 발송하여 데이터를 수집
indicator_name: Total amount of funding for developing countries to promote the development, transfer, dissemination and diffusion of environmentally sound technologies
global_indicator_name: Total amount of funding for developing countries to promote the development, transfer, dissemination and diffusion of environmentally sound technologies
indicator_definition: Environmentally Sound Technologies (ESTs) are technologies that have the potential for significantly improved environmental performance relative to other technologies.
title: Untitled
graph_title: 개도국에 친환경 기술의 개발과 이전, 보급 및 확산을 촉진하기 위해 지원하는 총 금액
